products.title: Our Collections
products.subtitle: Discover our curated selection of luxury home textiles, each piece crafted with meticulous attention to detail and timeless elegance.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Where Heritage Meets Modern Hospitality - Over three decades of crafting luxury textiles with passion and precision.

1990s.title: 1990s
1990s.content: Founded in Karur, one of India's oldest textile hubs, Amity International began as a small family business with a simple belief: that beautiful, high-quality home textiles can be made with soul, not excess.

2000s.title: 2000s
2000s.content: Expanded our operations to become a vertically integrated manufacturer, working closely with artisans, designers, and mills. We specialized in luxury cotton and linen home textiles.

2010s.title: 2010s
2010s.content: Began expanding globally, quietly powering shelves, showrooms, and interiors across North America, Europe, Japan, and Australia.

2020s.title: 2020s
2020s.content: Became a trusted textile partner for global retailers, design houses, and boutique hospitality brands worldwide.

today.title: Today
today.content: Continuing our mission to craft timeless home textiles that elevate everyday living — blending Indian craftsmanship with international quality and taste.

weSupplyTo.title: We Supply To
weSupplyTo.subtitle: Trusted by discerning businesses worldwide, we partner with brands that share our commitment to quality, craftsmanship, and timeless design.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.subtitle: From our headquarters in India, we export premium home textiles to discerning customers across the globe, bringing luxury and craftsmanship to homes worldwide.
